name: PolyJumping
description:
Hi !

Today, I present my new game made in 8h (Challenge) : PolyJumping !

PolyJumping is a arcade game with the for goal to jump for dodge the trunk and get the highest score all 100 points the speed of the trunck is multiplied by 1.25 after 1.5 etc .. (max 2.25).

"I know the icon is horrible but 8h game x)"
